name: morgoth-dao
description: Controlling DAO for Behodler Liquidity Protocol

scripts.compile: touch build/contracts/horse && rm -rf build/contracts/* && truffle compile
scripts.test: touch build/contracts/horse.txt && rm build/contracts/* && npm run compile && mocha --exit --recursive --timeout 10000
scripts.test:IronCrown: rm -rf build/contracts/* && truffle compile && cp build/contracts/IronCrown.json test/ABI/IronCrown.json && truffle test test/IronCrown.test.js
scripts.test:zeppelin: npm run test:Angband && npm run test:Migration && npm run test:Powers
scripts.test:all: npm run test:zeppelin && cp build/contracts/IronCrown.json test/ABI/IronCrown.json && truffle test test/IronCrown.test.js && truffle test test/AddTokenToBehodler.test.js
